post: You are from Bratislava, around 20, you like music and would love to make a new friend? You might've found your candidate!

comment.body:
We are a rave crew going to 95 % of drum and bass raves in the city. This Friday next.

I can see from your username, this might not be your cup of tea.

But if you like skanking in a warehouse up to 4 am to dnb, dm me. Our moshpits are better;))))
Hey, how old are you exactly?

Down for clubbing this weekend? I‚Äôm solo travelling, from Norway and 30M. My ex gf dumped me but i already booked flight tickets. So yeah, i‚Äôll be alone in Bratislava from 19th-23rd. I‚Äôm down for anything, we can bars hopping first, meet new people and then go clubbing or something.
Caves, hej? R u going also to Vienna? I'd like to join someday if possible. Diky vlado
Can you recommend sth? Or where to look for?
jeg er s√• lei meg üôÅ hopper du kommer ha det godt i BA! ü´∂

naah BA dnb raves are perfect for us, small events or big events, there is everything here

and nothing beats just getting out of the club / hall and being in bed in 20 minutes

F√∏rste kj√¶rlighetssorg er grusomt üòî..
Jeg skal pr√∏ve √• bli kjent med folk og har det g√∏y alene. Jeg ble invitert av henne julemiddag, skal feirer jul med familien hennes. S√• det er noe jeg ser frem til ellers jeg har ikke noe planer. 

Gleder meg til nye minner, men samtidig gruer meg til d√•rlige minner. Jeg anner ikke hva jeg gj√∏r lenger, jeg er helt borte.
well then, see you in utopia :D
which rave, or where to look for raves?

fy faen‚Ä¶ jeg vet eksakt hvordan du f√∏ler deg n√•. Min kj√¶reste gjorde noe lignende, vi skulle ta kr√§ftskivan med hans familie i √•r og han dumpet meg dagen f√∏r.
Men! Slovakere er hjertelige mennesker, og n√•r du kommer til dem og sp√∏r om du kan ta en √∏l med dem, kommer dere til √• bli bestevenner! Dessverre kommer jeg den 23. og drar tilbake til Sverige den 28., ellers kunne vi m√∏ttes üò•

ahh. You can follow either labels or clubs, but I only know DNB scene, not others

for example we are going here on Friday [https://www.instagram.com/p/DAoQY04tYqv/](https://www.instagram.com/p/DAoQY04tYqv/)

apart from Pulsation, also Masokombinat, Bassizm, Rezzonate, Bass Factory, Trident are very active labels in Bratislava. They either throw club nights, festivals or big 2000 people hall events.

for rave venues / clubs, check Wax2, Subdeck, Sundeck, Fuga, ≈†afko, Rados≈• and other clubs, they post events in advance for example on Instagram

there are other clubs in the city like Trafo, Channels, The Club and others but play generic pop / edm music

Eksen min er bekymrer for meg og stresser fordi slovakere kan v√¶re rasistisk mot asiater. Hun vet at jeg stoler p√• folk lett üò≠
 
Oppholde p√• hostel s√• det blir sikkert spennende √• treffe turister.
noen j√¶vlar er rasistiske, men vanligvis ikke mot asiater. jeg tror du kommer til √• bli helt okei :)
